Summary a superiority object

Source: R/summary.superiority.R
summary.superiority.Rd

Summary the superiority object in two ways. By default, the results are shown in the R console. The results can also be exported to the directory into a *.txt file.

# S3 method for superiority
summary(object, export = FALSE, file.name = NULL,
  digits = 3, ...)

Arguments

object

The superiority object
export

A logical argument. If TRUE, a *.txt file is exported to the working directory.
file.name

The name of the file if export = TRUE
digits

The significant digits to be shown.
...

Other arguments of the function

Examples


library(metan)
model = superiority(data_ge2, ENV, GEN, REP, PH)
summary(model)
#> Variable PH 
#> ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Superiority index considering all, favorable and unfavorable environments
#> ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> # A tibble: 13 x 7
#>    Genotypes Pi_all  Or_a Pi_favorable  Or_f Pi_unfavorable  Or_u

#>  1 H1        0.0258     1      0.0113      8         0.0403     1
